item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }
Currently Post-doctoral Researcher at iDiv in Leipzig working with Marten Winter. Interested in Macroecology, Functional diversity , Open and Reproducible Science.

item.title: R Packages
item.description: You can find a list of the packages I heavily contributed on my R-universe. package name package status description ecolottery an R package to simulate community assembly using coalescent theory funrar Compute functional rarity indices (see more at https://rekyt.github.io/funrar/) rromeo   R client to SHERPA/RoMEO the database on journal archival policies (see more at https://ropensci.github.io/rromeo/) fundiversity Fast and modular computation of functional diversity indices funbiogeo A package to help functional biogeography analyses rtaxref R client to the French Taxonomic Reference (see more at https://rekyt.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I gave more than 70 hours of courses at the different universities I’ve worked in: Course name Level Total time Practical session in Descriptive Statistics with R (UM) Bachelor’s (2nd yr) 50h (2017-2018 and 2018-2019) Practical session in Functional Biogeography with R (UM) Master’s (2nd yr) 8h (2018-2019 and 2019-2020) Guest Lecture on Biodiversity Facets (UL) Master’s (1st year) 2h (2020-2021) Practical session on Biodiversity Facets with R (UL, material) Master’s
